### About

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

shinyPhangorn is a simple interface to infer phylogentic trees using the R packages ape and phangorn.
It is possible to run it from within R:
```shiny::runGitHub('shinyPhangorn', 'KlausVigo')```
              
The source code of shinyPhangorn is available on [Github](https://github.com/KlausVigo/shinyPhangorn). 
shinyPhangorn is in early development so I am happy to recieve suggestions or bug reports.
